vclaim: A symbol for the extremist group Three Percenters could be seen on Derek Chauvin's left palm after he was convicted of murder in the killing of George Floyd.
title: Does Derek Chauvin Have a ‘Three Percenters’ Symbol on His Hand?
subtitle: A blurry image of the former police officer taken as he was led away in handcuffs sparked speculation.
author: Bethania Palma
